TopicTitle: Engine sound reacting to aircraft pitch*

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home 22H2 19045.3803 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 | GPU: Gigabyte Windforce RTX 2070 8G | RAM: 16GB

 

Severity: Low
Frequency: high (every time I tested)
Description: As I launch an aircraft with any jet engine (tested panther and Whiplash) I noticed that the engine sound pitch not only reacts to throttle, but it will also vary with aircraft pitch*. 
If I pitch* up the sound frequency is higher and if I dump the nose, the sound frequency goes down as well.
Noticeable right from the start of the flight, even with engine restarts.
Relaunching the game had no effect.
I marked every pitch with an * because I am unable to tell wether the frequency is related to actual pitch or vertical speed or vertical angle of prograde. I tried testing for this but it was hard to tell which one is truly controlling the engine sound.
Video included with a short demo. Given in 720p for reduced file size.
Willing to provide further information if needed.

Thank you for this awesome game and journey.
